An Assembly_module_component is a type of
and a type of . The Assembly_module_component is an occurrence of the usage view of an , and represents the inclusion of a specific product version in the associated assembly.

note.p: Assembly_module_component may be useful in a vertically integrated concurrent engineering environment, where full data sharing is allowed, as it permits visibility into the fact that there is a design definition of the component that is an .

ext_description.note: An enterprise could use this capability in the case of co-design of assembly and integrated circuits.
Hierarchical physical design does not require this capability but this is the most explicit way to support hierarchical electrical traceability.
ext_description.example: Consider a daughter board instance as an Assembly_module_component. The design organization maintains explicit traceability between the design version and usage versions of the daughter board for archival purposes which permits more detailed analysis of the assembly than if the daughter board were modeled as an occurrence of a .
